did.unittitle: Mrs. Robert Low Pierrepont invitation lists
did.abstract: The Mrs. Robert Low Pierrepont invitation lists consist of 2 bound volumes with invitation lists that include the name and address of various invitees to events hosted by Mrs. Pierrepont, the wife of Robert E. Pierrepont, a prominent banker.
